blog.name: the-year-of-heroes
blog.title: The Year Of Heroes: Here to Save Your Dates
blog.description:
We are a charity calendar project for the Boku no Hero animanga! Contributor apps closing soon !!

About || FAQ || Timeline || Mods

summary: REMNANT SALES OPEN!  Sales for our leftover stock are now open! Physical items are available to purchase until stock runs out...
body:
REMNANT SALES OPEN!

Sales for our leftover stock are now open! Physical items are available to purchase until stock runs out and digital items will be available for a week after our last physical item is sold. Items will be shipped every Friday on the week of purchase. See information on leftover stock below. This is your last chance to order your calendar, don’t miss out!

Order Here!

Each sale of this calendar will help us do our own act of heroism! Profits from The Year Of Heroes will be donated the Carter Center. The Carter Center is the former US President Jimmy Carter’s foundation, which focuses on raising the quality of life in more than 80 countries through campaigning for stronger democracies and human rights, solving conflicts, raising mental health awareness and much, much more.

Leftover Stock:

21 Calendars ($18)

15 50-Week Weekly Planner Pads ($12)

2 90 Sticker Stickerbooks ($10)

First 7 physical orders come with a surprise pen or post-it pad FREE

Unlimited orders for Digital Calendars ($8) and Chibi Phone Wallpapers ($3)

This won’t stick around, don’t miss out!

The Carter Center ⭐ Full Contributor List

blog.description:
art blog: https://starlight-pearl.tumblr.com
🌹
Hello, call me Nena! I'm 26 years old and I love to draw! Feel free to ask me anything.
I love YuGiOh! ZEXAL, Steven Universe, Boku No Hero Academia, and Spideypool
❤️
I also love video games like Legend of Zelda, Splatoon, Sonic the Hedgehog, Pokemon, and a bunch of others, mostly Nintendo games. 
💜
I love a whole lot of other cartoons/anime, and I ship gay, straight, and anything else that interest me.
💙

summary: AHHHH A YANDERE ACCOUNT WITH GOOD WRITING? It’s a Christmas miracle! Do you think you can take a jab with some Yandere! Bakugo...
question: AHHHH A YANDERE ACCOUNT WITH GOOD WRITING? It’s a Christmas miracle! Do you think you can take a jab with some Yandere! Bakugo hcs? Thank you!!!
answer:
• He’ll resist you for as long as he’s able to. Bakugou hates the fact you’re a weakness of his, he absolutely can’t stand it. Still, he won’t let anyone lay a finger on you. When thoughts of you started entering his mind all the time, even when he was supposed to be focusing on training, he decides to do something about it.
  • To most, it was a wonder that you and Bakugou ever started dating in the first place. His reputation was known to most, and his reputation was one of overall hostility and foul-mouthedness, despite him being a hero. But they didn’t know how his ‘confession’ went; paired with violence the moment you denied him. In your panic, you’d sputtered out a ‘yes’, making the first step towards the mess you find yourself tangled up in now. He refused to let you go.
  • He isn’t afraid to use aggression against anyone bothering you, but there’s not much keeping him from lashing out against you either. It doesn’t take much to set him off. Bakugou’s threats rarely go unfulfilled while he’s in such a state. His jealousy is strong and always present, he’ll take it out physically on you from time to time, to make sure you learn your lesson. Nevertheless, this is a last resort. He is quicker to use blackmail involving your friend’s lives if he wants you to act better.
  • While it’s a striking difference from how he’s usually, there are times where he will be almost sweet, often after you’ve been good after a while.  However, this is walking on eggshells. His voice can be completely calm one moment and he’ll be screaming at you the next. It’s more unpredictable than his normal self.
  • He can’t seem to keep his hands off of you. Everywhere you two go together, he’ll have an arm around your waist, hold your hand or anything else of the sort. It’s his possessive behaviour leaking through. Bakugou doesn’t merely do it because he wants to send a clear message to others, he also genuinely likes touching you.
  • Your body will be covered in his markings. He’ll purposefully bite spots he knows others are bound to see them, regardless of that, he also adorns places like your thighs with his marks.

summary: hi I need blogs to follow so please lemme know via reblogging/liking/commenting if you post about any of this so I can follow...
body:
hi I need blogs to follow so please lemme know via reblogging/liking/commenting if you post about any of this so I can follow you:

-Voltron
-BNHA
-Danganronpa (1, SDR2 or V3)
-Fanganronpas
-Trials of Apollo/Magnus chase
-Vocaloid??? im not sure if anyone posts about them but anything is possible on tumbls
-Gloomverse
-Cookie run
-Incorrect quotes on any of the fandoms mentioned above
-Writing prompts/art prompts
-Worldbuilding/original stories/original characters
-Autism
-Aesthetics (love me some neons/purples but any will do so too)
-Cute animals
-Memes are also acceptable

I may update this list eventually but pleas-
(sorry if I clog any of the tags below btw)

blog.name: quirky-hero-imagines
blog.title: BNHA Imagines
blog.description:
Heyo! Another imagines and writing BNHA blog because there can never be enough💕 INBOX IS CLOSED [33]

Masterlist

FAQ Rules

summary: Omg, i really like the headcanons for the short s/o, that was brilliant 😍 Could you do the same but this time with a tall s/o?...
question: Omg, i really like the headcanons for the short s/o, that was brilliant 😍 Could you do the same but this time with a tall s/o? (I'm 6'0 and at my place people are not so tall and happy to be with a taller person 😞)
answer:
Thank you for sending a request ❤️

I’m so glad you like the other post but it sucks to hear that you struggle with your height. I’m sure that you will find someone who loves you the way you are.

I hope this will make you feel better for now!


  • Denki Kaminari: This guy would be drooling over you and totally perving over your long legs. He likes to say that your height just means there is more to love.
  • Todoroki Shoto: He loves how elegant your height makes you look. In his eyes you are nothing less than stunning.
  • Ochaco Uraraka: She is such a sweetheart and looks up to you so much. She doesn’t mind your height at all, remarking that no matter how tall you would be, she would always float up to kiss you.
  • Hanta Sero: He doesn’t show it but sometimes he gets a little insecure because everyone calls him plain. You saw something special in him though, and he saw the same in you. However, he still can’t help but wonder how such a plain guy got such a beautiful girl.

I’m so glad you like the other post but it sucks to hear that you struggle with your height. I’m sure that you will find someone who loves you the way you are.

I hope this will make you feel better for now!


  • Denki Kaminari: This guy would be drooling over you and totally perving over your long legs. He likes to say that your height just means there is more to love.
  • Todoroki Shoto: He loves how elegant your height makes you look. In his eyes you are nothing less than stunning.
  • Ochaco Uraraka: She is such a sweetheart and looks up to you so much. She doesn’t mind your height at all, remarking that no matter how tall you would be, she would always float up to kiss you.
  • Hanta Sero: He doesn’t show it but sometimes he gets a little insecure because everyone calls him plain. You saw something special in him though, and he saw the same in you. However, he still can’t help but wonder how such a plain guy got such a beautiful girl.

blog.name: gun-for-all
blog.description: Bnha stands for breaking news: huge ass

summary:
Fun fact: I have too many Bnha OCs. 
Their hair is supposed to be Sundews, their eye is a butterwort, and their teeth are...
body:
Fun fact: I have too many Bnha OCs.

Their hair is supposed to be Sundews, their eye is a butterwort, and their teeth are reminiscent of a Venus flytrap. Along with having incredibly fast reflexes, they secrete an acid and pheromone from their skin which lures villains towards them. They mostly fight using hand to hand combat since their quirk isn’t well suited to combat.

They’re also supposed to be really attractive but… well, I guess my art style can’t really do them justice lmao
